name: Anthony Brown
text: Worse place ever!! They don't know how to do their job!

name: Tara Ortega
text: This company stole my dog off my porch when they was only supposed to be picking up a vehicle. He tried to steal subwoofers and amp out of my car police had to make him give them to me. He also broke 2 fishing poles in my car and a floor jack throwing stuff around. I am currently tracking him driving the car from attalla to rainbow city he is raising cane in the car attempting to tear it up. Very unprofessional man and a thief. I do not want the car back because he is breaking it!!!!!

name: Michelle Riggs
text: Dented vehicle

name: NW
text:
Local staff are ok , the staff at their corporate office are script reading zombies. I eventually managed to find someone willing to be a decent human being.
Their tow driver is an absolute bafoon who decided to just go help himself to my sidearm in my truck. And then decides to unload the weapon while pointing the muzzle at me and his buddy. (Not his place to touch my weapon nor unload it.) If he felt that uncomfortable  he should have got in his truck and left or called the police. Other than that no issue with dealing with these folks.

name: Mega Burroughs
text: A horrible place to go and pick up your car. I've never heard of having to have an appointment to get my car. Then you ask them nicely to let you come get your car today because you have to work now I have to call in. Complete rude and horrible company. This place needs to learn how to be nice to people and not have appointments to get yr car its crazy.

name: bobby raffield
text: Melissa and April are Great, Everything went smooth and fast. I know they have to deal with a lot of angry clients.👍🤩

name: Spilt Tea Tarot By: ELT
text: Unprofessional, RUDE!!! Showed up for an appointment on time. Lady at desk was out smoking a cigarette. Waited until she was through to get back to her desk, and she had the nerve to claim we were 2 minutes late and that we missed our appointment. It wasn't until she was called out for smoking on the side of building that she dropped the issue. Not only a dirty attitude, but her personal hygiene was as well. The place is disgusting. Prepare yourself prior to going. If you hear the sound of banjos don't say I didn't warn you. The hills have eyes!

name: Jauane Daniels
text: Went to pick up my son's car. A staff member ACTUALLY hit 2 parked cars trying to back it out! Manager was EXTREMELY rude! Had to call police!!! All around terrible experience

name: Alissa Brown
text: The people who work here are rude and disrespectful. Management needs to redo their staff and think of better ways to have people served properly. I was charged a whole day for only four minutes of my car being gone from my home. It’s unnecessary and robbery of money. I pray y’all do better in the future.

name: Katie Kendrick
text: Repo guy broke into my car at 5am...I’m CENTER POINT, and refused to provide documentation about who he was. He hooked my FRONT WHEEL DRIVE car up from the back and drug it off in park. You can’t tow a front wheel drive car from the rear- it tears up the transmission. Today is day 7 of trying to figure out where my car is even located. Corporate would not give me any info until I made an appointment. Now I was just informed that all my personal property was removed from my car by the staff here and is being stored at another location??!!?!? They also said I cannot actually look at my car. Wells Fargo has advised me to file a police report against this crooked bunch of people.

name: Brian Reid
text: Went with my daughter to get her car. Rude, uncourteous, non-professional people. Referred her to call corporate to get her car then corporate referred her back to these people all with us sitting there. No other customers in the office and the employees just sitting around yet they told her she had to have an appointment to get her car. The next appointment was not until the next morning! Someone should shut these people down for being so out of touch with the real world.

name: Tiff Bourne
text: The people here are so rude and completely incompetent. They had a tough time simply comparing the name on my ID to the name on my paper work. I understand that it's not a customer based operation but it's totally uncalled for the way they treat people.

name: Andy Hawkins
text: Easy to work with. Great people.

name: Geoffrey Eggleton
text: Wouldn’t let me get my own things out of my car and now I see why. Took most of my prescription Adderall out of the bottle and left barely any. The lady who cleaned out my car was very very rude and tried to argue with me about something she claimed she put in the bag. Learn customer service, I was nothing but respectful.

name: Cassandra Ashworth
text: My car was repossessed on Jan 24. I had 10 fays to get my car back. They transferred my car to a local sister dealership the thursday after, 8 days later. Paid in full on the 9th day. Went to pick my car up and everything was gone out of it. Even my tag and registration! It is now Feb 14th ans I still can't get them to call me back, and have not gotten my things, including 200$ worth of tools, a brand new lawn mower battery, and various odds and ends. And lets not forget my tag and REGISTRATION! WHY! They were prepping it for resale.

name: Erin Domino
text: The lady at the front desk (who didn’t want to disclose her name) was VERY RUDE AND UNPROFESSIONAL! Upon entering i  watched staff play with change and have personal conversations instead of asking me what i needed. Was scheduled a personal pick up appointment and the vechicle wasn’t even at the place. When asked why was i scheduled the appointment if the car wasn’t there, they said corporate didn’t know the car wasn’t there after having the car for over 24 hours! Instead of getting an apology about the inconvenience, the anonymous lady just gave me rude responses. Definitely need to learn customer service bc it’s lacking!

name: Teri Griffin
text:
They jumped the gun...had to July 6th to come up with money to get my car back. On July 3rd...Had already paid the money & was told my car was not there, it had been released to go to auction, & it was on it's way back to their lot. Got to Pinson from Cullman...car was still not there. After sitting there from around 10:30 am until almost 5 pm my car finally comes back. They also done damage to my car & denied my claim against them & blamed it on the transpoter. In turn found out the transporter was also them!!! Now having to retain a lawyer just to get a dent fixed!!!
A BUNCH OF BS!!!!

name: Kim C. Green
text: Extremely professional and thorough staff. Really appreciate the great job you do.

name: Desiree Richardson
text: Tried to charge me $50 to get my personal belongings (including my wallet, debit cards, etc). Then still didn’t give me all that was in my car. The worst!!!!

name: Joann Cook
text: I was made to wait 45 minutes, after being told 15 minutes, and she ignored me standing in the little office. Then talked about me right there. Very Ruded!!!

name: Micheala Short
text: 1st and worst experience ever!! I was there helping a family member and because the rude,unprofessional,awful looking women at the desk that just sits on her butt looking at window says she got release papers a little bit after the appointment she couldn’t release car. No one else even there for appointment and we were there early! We even offered to pay for her time and was just a total b****. I work in health care and I am am around all sorts of people all the tine and this whole experience was the absolute worst 😓. Karma will get you every time! Pray you don’t ever have to deal with them!

name: Jennifer Phillips
text:
My car was picked up by this so called towing company on April 29, 2019 and my car payment was made that morning and now it is 16 days later and no car and can’t get the things that were in my car. Went to get the stuff on the 16th day and they stole a wallet that had $200 and all the change in my car. They also did property damage when they picked up my car. I am suing them as well as the finance co. In Memphis , Tenn.
Jennifer

name: Tito Hawkins
text: Wont trust them to pet a snake

name: Keeping Up With Deanna
text: Rude and very disrespectful.

name: Elizabeth Boyd
text: Polite and helpful. Run by 2 bad ass chicks.

name: Sonya Franklin
text: We was looking for new house

name: Denise Walden
text: If I had an option to rate 0 I would have!  Unprofessional as they come!

name: Shane Caton
text: Rude and just wrong to treat people like they do

name: That Guy
text: Awesome people

name: Will
text: Very rude and disrespectful

name: Nicole Hample
text: Receptionist was very rude!

name: Kaden Minor
text: Thieves

name: Samantha McCoy
text: Very professional

name: Cassandra orr
text: Rude

name: Frankie Wyatt
text: Very professional

name: Tyler Cassels
text: Friendly staff. But why has everyone been on lunch for 2 hours now? Yet you can hear everyone in the warehouse laugh and clowning around. You might not have anything to do after you get a truck loaded but we do. Slow and long breaks. Let’s see how fast they can unload me.

name: Aung Ling
text:
All ⭐️
Appointment 12:00 am
Check IN 17:00
Loaded 17:45
Thank you

name: Admir Lufi
text: It was a white  big guy there i suppose to pick up 1 am hi put me in the dock 5 pm god bless him was very nice and cool thank you even if i no know you’re name

name: Juan Arredondo
text: The entrance to plastipack it’s not correct the entrance it’s at the end of the road in front of publix   Distribution center need to fix this at the map

name: Kuldip Singh
text: There is nice big gye inside I have appointment 1 am but i was their earlier 9:30 pm they loaded very quick nice and thanks everyone there

name: OTR TRUCKER
text: Simple fast drop hook

name: Young Boy
text: Great service at the shipping desk. Got here the day before my 5 pm appointment and got loaded. Nice people!

name: Tony ngannou
text: I had a good experience here. I was picking up a load that was dropped by another carrier, so I was already arriving after the appointment time. They took me in and had me loaded in about 1.5 hours. Anything under 2 hours is good in this industry.

name: Jesus Fernandez
text:
This is one of the most best places to get loaded, I do not talk about one experience I talk about more than 300 loads I take from this place.
They are profesional, friendly and fast workers, always is been a pleasure take loads from you. Thanks and please never change. Fermar Transport

name: Felix Reed
text:
Very unprofessional and rude. Complete disregard for truckers and the product of the customer (Pepsi).

Plastipak, I hope Pepsi cancels your contract and finds a more professional bottle supplier

I dealt with dude in charge of shipping (8-5-17 5pm)

name: Robert Kinkead
text: Was advised I could deliver early only to find out upon arrival there would be a 3 plus hour wait. Get it together!

name: Jerry Moore
text: Very slow. Appointment was at 1900 on 01/19/2020 . 14hrs later and counting still waiting

name: Sladan Stamenkovic
text: Shipping office is red X

name: Angela Johnson
text: Please whatever you do. Nooooooo!!!!! Find another job. RUN!!!!!!!!!!

name: will Sab
text: Drop hook no complaints

name: Medhanie Habtemichael
text: Bad shipping office he was angry while i was talking to him never seen in my life like this shipping office

name: Afg
text: Why the shipper man too much angry. But working fast

name: Nathaniel Wayne
text: by far the most rude and unprofessional entity on the planet.

name: melvin cummings
text: Loaded me in about 3 hours and I did notice unpleasant attitudes but not overwhelmingly rude,  just a little.

name: ilhom yunusov
text: very slow i’m come for delivery 10:00am out 5:00pm

name: - Andrei -
text: Shipping don't  want to work.

name: Adrian Prusak
text: Nice, loaded quickly
